mapper.insert: insert into xt_gnxx (gnbh, sjgnbh, gnmc, gnljdz, zjljdz, gnlbdm, gnbbh, gnicon, cjsj, czsj) values (#{gnbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjgnbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnljdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjljdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update xt_gnxx set sjgnbh = #{sjgnbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnmc = #{gnmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnljdz = #{gnljdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zjljzz = #{zjljdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnlbdm = #{gnlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnbbh = #{gnbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnicon = #{gnicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjsj = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, czsj = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where gnbh = #{gnbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select gnbh, sjgnbh, gnmc, gnljdz, zjljdz, gnlbdm, gnbbh, gnicon, cjsj, czsj from xt_gnxx
select b.* from (select * from xt_jsgnxx where glybh = #{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) a left join xt_gnxx b on a.gnbh = b.gnbh
select b.* from xt_jsgnxx a left join xt_gnxx b on a.gnbh = b.gnbh where a.glybh = #{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from xt_gnxx where gnbh not in (select gnbh from xt_jsgnxx where glybh = #{glybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
